p: Lamotrigine was gifted from Hilton Pharmaceuticals Pvt. Ltd. Other chemicals/reagents/excipients included Eudragit ® RS 100 (Evonik, Darmstadt, Germany), Ethanol, dicholoromethane, dibutyl phthalate (DBP), aloe, oleic acid, propylene glycol (PG), lemon oil, potassium dihydrogen phosphate and sodium hydroxide (Merck, Darmstadt, Germany). The patch components such as backing membrane (3M-9720) and release liner (SCOTCHPAK 9755) were gifted by 3M, St. Paul, USA. Acrylate adhesive Duro-Tak ® 387/2510 was supplied by Henkel Corporation (Bridgewater, USA).
